snippet: A Circuit Court judge in Jackson temporarily blocked the release of 21 inmates on Wednesday night who were among 215 convicts granted clemency by Gov. Haley Barbour in his final days in office.
abstract: Circuit Court judge in Jackson, Mississippi, temporarily blocks the release of 21 inmates who were among the 215 convicts granted clemency by Gov Haley Barbour in his final days in office.
lead_paragraph: A Circuit Court judge in Jackson temporarily blocked the release of 21 inmates on Wednesday night who were among 215 convicts granted clemency by Gov. Haley Barbour in his final days in office.

headline.main: Mississippi: Some Pardons by Barbour Are Halted
headline.print_headline: Mississippi: Some Pardons By Barbour Are Halted
